title: Online Learning Design Strategies to Enhance MOOC Participation Motivation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience using digital learning platforms
context.additional_context: Non-degree course for corporate managers/leaders to strengthen language-specific job competencies

learning_goals: Explanation of three or more impacts of MOOC platform design elements on learner motivation.
Presentation of five motivational factors to consider when designing online courses for corporate learners.
Application of engagement enhancement strategies incorporating gamification and networking elements to real-world cases.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
